interpretation: The broken heart emoji represents emotional pain and heartbreak. It may indicate a recent breakup, loss, or disappointment. This card reminds us that it's okay to feel hurt and take time to heal. It also warns against holding onto negative emotions and encourages letting go of the past to move forward. The broken heart can also symbolize vulnerability and the need for self-care. Keywords associated with this card include heartache, sadness, grief, healing, and resilience.
